name: priority: critical
description: Urgent issue that requires immediate resolution.

name: priority: high
description: High-priority issue that should be addressed soon.

name: priority: medium
description: Moderate priority. Needs attention but not urgent.

name: priority: low
description: Low-priority task that can be scheduled later.

name: status: blocked
description: Cannot proceed until a blocker is resolved.

name: status: in progress
description: Currently being worked on.

name: status: review needed
description: Needs code or design review before proceeding.

name: status: ready to merge
description: Reviewed and approved. Ready to be merged.

name: status: done
description: Completed and verified.

name: status: on hold
description: Paused temporarily. Will resume later.

name: status: needs info
description: Requires additional information to proceed.

name: status: stale
description: Inactive for a while. Needs follow-up or will be closed.

name: type: bug
description: Something is broken or not working as expected.

name: type: feature
description: New feature or functionality.

name: type: enhancement
description: Improvements to existing functionality.

name: type: documentation
description: Docs or content-related task.

name: type: maintenance
description: Codebase upkeep, refactoring, or dependency updates.

name: type: testing
description: Testing or QA-related task.

name: type: deployment
description: Deployment or infrastructure-related task.

name: type: support
description: User or technical support.

name: type: question
description: Asking for clarification, advice, or help.

name: type: discussion
description: Open-ended discussion or brainstorming topic.
